P1422 小玉家的电费

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n;
    float ans;
    cin>>n;
    if(n<=150)
    {
    	ans=n*0.4463;
    }
	else if(n<=400)
	{
		ans=150*0.4463+(n-150)*0.4663;
	}
	else
	{
		ans=150*0.4463+250*0.4663+(n-400)*0.5663;
	}
	printf("%.1f\n",ans);
    return 0;
}
Feel free to share!
